_aChangeLog.text: Many balancing improvements and bug fixes
Modified layout for portions of the catacombs and forest stages

_sText:
Moderate-to-High difficulty zombie escape map for CS-Source

4 stages so far (final 5th stage in development). Each stage is based on a movie
 - 1 stage based on "Willy's Wonderland" (2021)
 - 1 stage based on "As above, So Below" (2014)
 - 1 stage based on "Harry Potter 3" (and 2nd game)
 - 1 stage based on "Sphere" (1998)

Full list of movies the map is based on, either directly or partially: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLQrWkLOneHqMPD0uOdY2YATVZqEaUObmy (including ones planned for the 5th stage)

Each stage is about 9-10 minutes. There are NPC-s and zombie items. The map is fast paced and requires a leader, it is designed to be an event map. I might add easy mode in future versions.

The map should be well tested, but let me know if you discover issues.

Happy Holidays
